entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • List constructs EF uses that require non-public code access #29843
    8.0.0
  • EF Core 7 Unable to create a new migration using TPH inheritance with an Enum type named Discriminator #29993
    8.0.0
  • Stylecop is interfering with EfBundle creation in docker image in gitlab CI #30074
    8.0.0

Updated

  • Support of unnamed parameters in Microsoft.Data.Sqlite #24480
    Backlog
  • Comparing a property with a value converter against null throws exception in EF7 InMemory #29603
  • Non-empty second migration in TPC scheme using inheritance #30058
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7 regression: Deletion can cause error "The association between entity types A and B has been severed etc." #30122
    7.0.x
  • RevEng: Decimal column with same precision and scale as the default produce warnings at runtime #12241
    Backlog
  • Compiled models with JSON columns #29602
    8.0.0
  • Add Generic version of EntityTypeConfiguration Attribute #30072
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Store null table name in the model snapshot for TPC abstract types #30257
  • Add NativeAOT support for Change Tracking #30256
  • Support JSON columns in compiled models #30254

Merged

  • Don't set table names from DbSet properties when Discriminator property is conflicted with the default but is then configured explicitly #30234
  • Mark bundle Program.cs as auto-generated #30210
